category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 38 (Sports Fair Committee)
contents: Article 38 (Fair Sports Committee) ① City/provincial sports councils establish the Fair Sports Committee to achieve the following purposes. Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. Management of the articles of incorporation and regulations of the city/provincial sports association and member organizations of the city/provincial sports association 2. Rewards or disciplinary action against member organizations and individuals of the city/provincial sports association and the city/provincial sports association 3. City · Deliberation on recognition of exceptions to the limit on the number of consecutive terms of office for members of the Provincial Sports Council ② The members of the Sports Fair Committee shall be composed of the following persons and shall be elected at the general meeting. However, the appointment authority can be delegated to the chairman by resolution of the general meeting, and in this case, the chairman must form a recommendation committee that includes a majority of outsiders, listen to their opinions, make an appointment, and report the results to the next general meeting. Revised 2020. 2. 11., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Legal practitioners such as legal scholars and lawyers 2. People who majored in a sports-related field and have experience working at a university or accredited research institute 3. 10 in the sports field A person with more than two years of experience 4. A person with experience working in the field of human rights Newly established on May 29, 2019, October 6, 2021 ③ Any person who falls under any of the following items can become a member of the Sports Fair Committee. does not exist. 1. Persons who have received disciplinary action from sports organizations, city/province, city/county/district sports organizations under Article 2, Paragraph 9 (a) through (c) of the National Sports Promotion Act. Revised on May 29, 2019, October 6, 2021. 2. Persons who are executives and employees of the Sports Council and sports council-related organizations. Revised May 10, 2022. ④ Members of the Sports Fair Committee cannot concurrently serve as members of other committees. Newly established 2021. 2. 4., 2021. 10. 6. ⑤ In addition, matters related to the composition and operation of the city/provincial sports association sports fair committee are separately handled by the city/provincial sports council in accordance with the sports council's articles of incorporation and the 'Sports Fair Committee Regulations'.
